description: This file defines a singleton helper class 'NotesDbHelper' extending SQLiteOpenHelper for managing an SQLite database in an Android app, including creation and upgrade logic for the notes and folders tables.

classes.name: NotesDbHelper
classes.description: A singleton class managing database creation and version management for notes and folders.

methods.name: onCreate
methods.description: Creates database tables and indexes when database is first created.

methods.name: onUpgrade
methods.description: Handles database schema upgrades; currently empty for initial version.

methods.name: getInstance
methods.description: Provides a thread-safe singleton instance of NotesDbHelper.
